name: Two Worlds (itch) (Hugo Filipe)
description:
Sinopse:

The game takes place in a dream, in the character's imagination where he is confronted and in love with his Doppelganger. Both are then in love with an eros love (love carnal, physical and desire for the other) that prevents them from reaching their goal, finding each other. They go through challenges and arduous paths to transcend the dream to reality, to the encounter.

Movement:
A, D / Directional Keys Jump: Space/W

Credites:

We made the game for 5-day Game jam.

António Leite: Level Designer.;
Gonçalo Quitério:  Programmer, Game Tester;
Hugo Filipe:  Director, Level Designer, Game Desinger, Sound Desinger, Game Tester;
Vitor Duarte: Artist;
Jesus Silva: Artist;
José Vaz: Artist;
